pages.text: Advanced sensors has only one difference from base sensors. It will populate source of change, like, lever will populate player data and pressure plate will populate data about how pressed it.$(p)None of those sensors are configurable

pages.title: Advanced lever
pages.text: Upgraded lever, will additionally send information about player that toggled lever

pages.title: Advanced button
pages.text: Upgraded button, will additionally send information about player that pressed button. Take a note, that this is possible only for turn on event

pages.title: Advanced pressure plate
pages.text: Upgraded pressure plate, will additionally send information about entity on top of plate that pressed it. Take a not, that this is possible only for turn on event
